name: @sgratzl/rollup-plugin-css-only
description: Rollup plugin that bundles imported css

scripts.test:nested: cd test/nested && rm -rf output && rollup -c && cmp output/bundle.js expected/bundle.js && cmp output/bundle.css expected/bundle.css && cd ../..
scripts.test:simple: cd test/simple && rm -rf output && rollup -c && cmp output/output.js expected.js && cmp output/output.css expected.css && cd ../..
scripts.test:imports: cd test/imports && rm -rf output && rollup -c && cmp output/bundle.js expected/bundle.js && cmp output/bundle.css expected/bundle.css && cd ../..
scripts.test: npm run test:simple && npm run test:nested && npm run test:imports

author: Thomas Ghysels <info@thomasg.be>
